block.p: LEIBOWITZ-Ruben. Beloved husband of Esther. Devoted father of Sydelle Lee (Robert), Eileen Berg (Herman), Madeline Schnebel (Robert). Cherished grandfather of Marna, Abbe, Denise, Marc, Monique, Jodi, Dawn, Tara and Stefanie. Loving great grandfather of Erica, Samantha, Emma, Alex, Cassidy, Ian and Jake. Dear brother of Abraham. Services Wednesday, June 28, 12 Noon ''Sinai Chapels'', 162-05 Horace Harding Expy, Fresh Meadows, N.Y.

LEIBOWITZ-Ruben. Beloved husband of Esther. Devoted father of Sydelle Lee (Robert), Eileen Berg (Herman), Madeline Schnebel (Robert).
